workflow.name: Lonescale Hiring Signal - Send leads to lemlist and Hubspot
workflow.description:
Job offers are a goldmine of information.

Use them to boost your outreach results. 

They'll give you: 
- more context to personalize your messaging
- a steady flow of new leads
- the right timing to contact your lead

nodes.name: Slack - Notify CS team on Slack1

parameters.text:
={{ $node["Lonescale - New  Job Intent"].json["body"]["company_name"] }} Sales Team is hiring a {{ $node["Lonescale - New  Job Intent"].json["body"]["people_buying_signals_title"] }}

Might be the right team to upsell our product. 🚀

main.node: Slack - Notify sales team on Slack
Slack - Notify CS team on Slack1

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
